channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Blocking footpath and blocking another vehicle, 14th August
item.description:
Hi, This car have been parking here pretty much every day. It blocking me getting out of the drive as it is PARKING on the FOOTPATH! Can some please come can give it a ticket so the owner knows it is not ok to leave their car like that all day. Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Queensbridge Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Clothes again all over the pavement, 14th August
item.description:
The manager of the bin rarely empties is, resulting in bags being left beside it and then emptied onto the pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 109-115, Blackfriars Road, Southwark, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More dumped cars, 14th August
item.description:
The man who exports cars to Africa has started dumping cars again in Wallhouse road he lives in Slade green road please can you get these cars moved as when my family come home from work there is nowhere to park and we actually do bother to pay tax and mot charges

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wallhouse Road, Slade Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Public transport sign completely wrong, 14th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Amhurst Road, Hackney, London

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: No Entry sign not visible from the traffic lights in Bromley Road, 14th August
item.description:
If you stop at the traffic lights in Bromley Road there are no visible signs for a driver to not go straight on into Church Avenue. There is a sign but it is obscured by a new crossing light. In the past I have seen cars entering Church Road when there are no cars waiting to exit!!!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Avenue, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Carrier bag dog food, 14th August
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lynton Road, Old Kent Road, London

item.title: Public highway blockage, 14th August
item.description:
At least eight pedi cabs are occupying the pavements by Buckingham Palace exit to poach people coming out of the palace. They are causing obstacles and preventing smooth passage.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Grosvenor Place, Belgravia, London

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 14th August
item.description:
Rubbish dumped by people not living on our block most days usually overnight. Animals get to it, food and waste scatters everywhere and we have to clear it up. Bin lorry doesn’t take it as bins overflowing with rubbish that’s not from our block!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Victorian Grove, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown tree, 14th August
item.description:
Yet again! This tree requires pruning as is overhanging my property, keep hitting my head on the branches when getting in and out of my car. Fruit already dropping and littering my driveway and pavement. Is a constant problem. This has already been reported and you have closed the case with no action.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bourne Road, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet
